question:
Select the set in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following sets.

(NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g. 13 – Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

(21,61,125)

(11,31,65)
solution:
The logic follows here is:

1st number × 3 - 2 = 2nd number

2nd number × 2 + 3 = 3rd number

  • (21,61,125)

21

61

  • (11,31,65)

11

31

  • (16,46,95)

16

46

Therefore, the correct answer is: (16,46,95)

question:
Select the set in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following sets.

(NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g. 13 – Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

(64,17,13)

(65,19,8)
solution:
The Logic follows here is:

3 × 2nd number + 3rd number = 1st number.

  • (64,17,13)

3 × 17 + 13 = 64

  • (65,19,8)

3 × 19 + 8 = 65

  • (80,23,11)

3 × 23 + 11 = 80

Therefore, the correct answer is: (80,23,11)

question:
Select the set in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following sets.

(NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g. 13 – Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

(11,16,20)

(15,27,41)
solution:
The logic follows here is:

3 × (2nd number - 1st number) + 5 = 3rd number.

  • (11,16,20)

3 × (16 - 11) + 5 = 20

  • (15,27,41)

3 × (27 - 15) + 5 = 41

  • (19,32,44)

3 × (32 - 19) + 5 = 44

Therefore, the correct answer is: (19,32,44)

question:
Select the set in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following sets.

(NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g. 13 – Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

(5,80,11)

(9,95,10)
solution:
The logic follows here is:

(1st number + 3rd number) × 5 = 2nd number.

  • (5,80,11)

(5 + 11) × 5 = 80

  • (9,95,10)

(9 + 10) × 5 = 95

  • (6,70,8)

(6 + 8) × 5 = 70

Therefore, the correct answer is: (6,70,8)

question:
Select the set in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following sets.

(NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g. 13 – Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

(6,7,38)

(8,11,56)
solution:
The logic follows here is:

(1st number + 2nd number) × 3 - 1 = 3rd number.

  • (6,7,38)

(6 + 7) × 3 - 1 = 38

  • (8,11,56)

(8 + 11) × 3 - 1 = 56

  • (9,13,65)

(9 + 13) × 3 - 1 = 65

Therefore, the correct answer is: (9,13,65)

E.g. 13 – Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

(24,8,256)

(14,12,26)
solution:
The logic follows here is:

  • (24,8,256)

  • (14,12,26)
  • (18,12,90)

Therefore, the correct answer is: (18,12,90).

question:
Select the set in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following sets.

(NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g. 13 – Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

(36,14,104)

(22,19,108)
solution:
The logic follows here is:

(1st number- 10)(2nd number-10) = 3rd number

  • (36,14,104)

(36 - 10)(14 - 10) = 26

  • (22,19,108)

(22 - 10)(19 - 10) = 12108

  • (18,21,88)

(18 - 10)(21 - 10) = 8

Therefore, the correct answer is: (18,21,88)

question:

E.g. 13 – Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

(16,116,13)

(18,100,7)
solution:
The logic follows here is:

(1st number + 3rd number)

  • (16,116,13)

(16 + 13)> 29

  • (18,100,7)

(18 + 7)> 25

  • (16,136,18)

(16 + 18)> 34

Therefore, the correct answer is: (16,136,18)

question:
Select the set in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following sets.

(NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g. 13 – Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

(8,7,59)

(13,5,68)
solution:
Logic: (1st number 2nd number) + 3 = 3rd number

(8,7,59)

(8 + 3 = 59

(13,5,68)

(13 5) + 3 = 68

(3,8,27)

(3 8) + 3 = 27

Therefore, the correct answer is: (3,8,27)

question:
Select the set in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following sets.

(NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g. 13 – Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

(32,39,46)

(35,49,63)
solution:
Logic: (1st number + 3rd number) = 2nd number

(32,39,46)

(32 + 46) = 39

(35,49,63)

(35 + 63) = 49

(67,44,21)

(67 + 21) = 44

Therefore, the correct answer is: (32,39,46)
